PSSI akan Gelar Rapat Exco untuk Bahas Nasib Simon
04 Nov 2019, 23:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan telah memulai tugasnya sebagai ketua umum (ketum) PSSI periode 2019-2023. Langkah awal yang dilakukannya ialah bertemu dengan Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora), Zainudin Amali di Kantor Kemenpora, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Setelah itu, pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule ini rencananya akan memimpin rapat perdana komite eksekutif (exco). Salah satu yang bakal dibahas dalam pertemuan tersebut adalah nasib Simon Mcmenemy sebagai pelatih Timnas Indonesia.
"Besok (5 November 2019) kita akan rapat exco yah, besok kita akan tentukan," ujar Iwan Bule.
Sejauh ini, Simon tak bisa membawa Timnas Indonesia berbicara banyak di Kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2022 Zona Asia. Pelatih asal Skotlandia itu tidak mampu memberikan satu kemenangan pun untuk Skuat Garuda.
Dari empat laga yang sudah dijalani, Timnas Indonesia kalah 2-3 dari Malaysia, takluk 0-3 kontra Thailand, kandas 0-5 saat bersua Uni Emirat Arab, dan kalah 1-3 dari Vietnam. Hasil tersebut membuat Skuat Garuda terpuruk di dasar klasemen Grup G dengan nihil poin.

PSSI Will Hold Exco Meeting to Discuss Simon's Fate
Nov 04 2019, 23:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan has begun his duties as general chair of PSSI 2019-2023. The first step he took was to meet with the Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora), Zainudin Amali at the Ministry of Youth and Sports, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
After that, the man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule is scheduled to lead the inaugural meeting of the executive committee (EXCO). One of which will be discussed at the meeting is the fate of Simon Mcmenemy as Indonesian national team coach.
"Tomorrow (5 November 2019) we will have an exco meeting, tomorrow we will determine," said Iwan Bule.
So far, Simon has not been able to bring the Indonesian national team to say much in the 2022 World Cup Qualification Asian Zone. The Scottish coach was unable to give a single victory to the Garuda squad.
Of the four matches that have been undertaken, the Indonesian national team lost 2-3 from Malaysia, defeated 0-3 cons Thailand, ran aground 0-5 when the United Arab Emirates met, and lost 1-3 to Vietnam. These results make the Garuda squad slumped at the bottom of the Group G standings with zero points.
